Verses: 1 leebanOnE, akkini un kEdhurumarangaLaip patchikkumpadi un vaasalgaLaiththiRa.
2 dhEvadhaaru virutchangaLE, pulambungaL; kEdhurumarangaL vizhundhadhE; prabalamaanavaigaL paazhaakkappattana. paasaanin karvaalimarangaLE, pulambungaL; araNuLLa sOlai keezhE thaLLappattadhu.
3 mEyppargaLin magimai azhindhupOnapadiyaal, avargaL alaRugiRa saththam kEtkappadugiRadhu; yOrdhaanin perumai azhindhupOnapadiyaal, baalasingangaL garchchikkiRa saththam kEtkappadugiRadhuï¿½.
4 en dhEvanaagiya karththar sollugiRadhu ennavendraal, kolaiyuNgiRa aadugaLai mEykkakkadavaai.

5 avaigaLai udaiyavargaL, avaigaLaik kondrupOttuth thangaLukkuk kutramillaiyendru eNNugiRaargaL. avaigaLai viRkiRavargaL, karththarukkuSthOththiram, naangaL aisuvariyamuLLavargaLaanOm engiRaargaL; avaigaLai mEykkiRavargaL, avaigaLmEl irakkamvaikkiRadhillai.

6 naan ini dhEsaththuk kudigaLinmEl irakkamvaiyaamal manusharil yaavaraiyum avanavanudaiya ayalaan kaiyilum avanavanudaiya raajaavin kaiyilum adappadappaNNuvEn; avargaL dhEsaththai azhiththum, naan ivargaLai avargaL kaikkuth thappuvippadhillaiyendru karththar sollugiRaar.
7 kolaiyuNgiRa mandhaiyaagiya siRumaippatta ungaLai naan mEyppEn; naan iraNdu kOlgaLai eduththu, ondriRku anukkiragam endrum, ondriRku nikkiragam endrum pErittu mandhaiyai mEyththu,
8 orEmaadhaththilE moondru mEypparaiyum adhampaNNinEn; en aaththumaa avargaLai arOsiththadhu; avargaL aaththumaa ennaiyum veRuththadhu.
9 ini naan ungaLai mEyppadhillai; saagiRadhu saagattum, adhamaagiRadhu adhamaagattum; meedhiyaanavaigaLOvendraal, ondrin maamsaththai ondru thinnakkadavadhu endru naan solli,
10 anukkiragam ennappatta en kOlai eduththu, naan andha janangaLellaarOdum paNNiyirundha en udanpadikkai atruppOgumpadikku adhai muRiththuppOttEn,
11 annaaLilE adhu atruppOyitru; appadiyE mandhaiyil enakkuk kaaththirundha siRumaippattavaigaL adhu karththarudaiya vaarththaiyendru aRindhukoNdana.
12 ungaL paarvaikku nandraaikkaNdaal, en kooliyaith thaarungaL; illaavittaal irukkattum endru avargaLOdE sonnEn; appozhudhu enakkuk kooliyaaga muppadhu veLLikkaasai niRuththaargaL.

13 karththar ennai nOkki: adhaik kuyavanidaththil eRindhuvidu endraar; idhuvE naan avargaLaal madhikkappatta mEnmaiyaana madhippu; naan andha muppadhu veLLikkaasai eduththu avaigaLaik kuyavanukkendru karththarudaiya aalayaththilE eRindhuvittEn.
14 naan yoodhaavukkum iSravElukkum irukkiRa sagOdharakkattai atruppOgappaNNumpadikku, nikkiragam ennappatta en iraNdaam kOlaiyum muRiththEn.
15 karththar ennai nOkki: nee madhiyatra oru mEyppanudaiya aayudhangaLai innum eduththukkoL.

16 idhO, naan dhEsaththilE oru mEyppanai ezhumbappaNNuvEn; avan adhamaagiRavaigaLaip paraamarikkaamalum, sidhaRuNdadhaith thEdaamalum, noRunguNdadhai guNamaakkaamalum iLaiththirukkiRadhai aadharikkaamalum, kozhuththadhin maamsaththaith thindru, avaigaLudaiya kuLambugaLai udaiththuppOduvaan.
17 mandhaiyaik kaividugiRa abaththamaana mEyppanukku aiyO! pattayam avan buyaththinmElum avan valadhukaNNinmElum varum; avan buyamuzhudhum soombippOm; avan valadhukaN mutrilum iruL adaiyum endraar.
